channel.description:
No idea why the last thread was deleted without any type of reason nor notification....

item.title: RUNIQUE - Iron Man • Grand Exchange • Anti-Scam Gambling • Perfect Combat
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

This thread deserves a bump, the community is very deserving, honest, and what not. I’ve been apart of Runique for quite some time now regardless of what else I’ve been doing and I know the current owner(s) deserve all the fame they achieve. It being the second ONLY RSPS I’ve ever donated to, I suppose that should say something to everyone.

I’d recommend giving this server a chance and start getting active, they currently have double EXP online as of 6-9-15. Good luck and have some fun!

Read full topic
item.source: RUNIQUE - Iron Man • Grand Exchange • Anti-Scam Gambling • Perfect Combat

item.title: RUNIQUE - Iron Man • Grand Exchange • Anti-Scam Gambling • Perfect Combat
item.dc:creator: @adman189 adman189
item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

Here is the most recent of updates for Runique!

[URL=http://“http://forum.runique.org/index.php?/topic/3980-server-client-update-05112015/”]Server + Client Update [05/11/2015][/URL]

[SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Client/Server Updates]

[B]Client Updates[/B]

[ul][] Hitting backspace in your teleport chatbox will now bring you to the last hierarchy you were in. This effects things such as the skilling teleport; if you choose Agility, but meant to click Cooking, you can hit backspace in order to go back to the Skilling hierarchy.
[] Added 2 new achievements to the achievement tab
[] Fixed all of the links in the client’s navbar
[] Added a link to the forum’s latest updates section[/ul]

[LEFT][B]Server Updates[/B][/LEFT]

[ul][] Thanks to the suspicious activity of some players I was able to track down a dupe that has been occurring on the server. Thankfully through all the logs we hold and our economy manager program we were able to get rid of a good chunk of the duped coins
[] There is a security guard located near the bank in home. Here you will be able to set up various security settings for your account. Including the new account PIN. This pin will be used any time a new device logs into your account, you will not be able to play what-so-ever until it has been entered. Once entered on your device, you will no longer need to enter it before playing again (on said device).
[] Added an achievement for setting a bank pin (if you have already set one previously, you will receive the achievement upon clicking the achievement text)
[] Added an achievement for setting an account pin
[] Fixed the “Throw tomato at a staff member” achievement (has been fixed since yesterday)
[] Fixed the “Teleport to the altar of death” achievement (has been fixed since yesterday)
[] Donators+ will now receive full special attack upon killing a player
[] Added new items to the “PvM Store (2)”:
[] Saradomin abyssal whip: this whip has slightly higher equipment bonuses than a vine whip and also has a special ability which will freeze your opponent for 6 seconds while also leeching their prayer points and hitpoints equal to what you have hit. Upon being used in combat it has a 1/5 chance of healing 1/4 of the damage you have dealt.
[] Mega-phonus: can be wielded and operated to yell a special message
[] Bearhead: just a bear head
[] Fixed a bug where trying to renew your summoning familiar without having one would disconnect you
[] Added more logs and also made existing logs more descriptive on players. This way we will be able to investigate hackings, as well as duping or bug abuse, a lot more efficiently
[] Moved the dragon impling away from gamble zone as it allowed you to no clip out of the map[/ul]
[/SPOILER]

Read full topic

item.title: RUNIQUE - Iron Man • Grand Exchange • Anti-Scam Gambling • Perfect Combat
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

[quote=“adman189, post:28, topic:548869”]Bump: [URL=http://“http://runique.org/forum/index.php?/topic/3523-small-updates-041815/”]Recent Updates [04/18/15][/URL]

General Updates:

Highscores have finally been released which can be viewed here [URL=http://“http://runique.org/highscores.php”]Runique Highscores[/URL]

[SPOILER=Highscores][/SPOILER]

Client Updates:

We also have a new login screen made by ZeHD
Along with a new Donator rank added in-game and a modified Veteran rank added - Courtesy of Felix

[SPOILER=Login Screen][/SPOILER]

Skilling Updates

As a lot of you have noticed, specific skills were very innaccurate on their xp compared to RS’ experience and the game mode xp rate. This was because before we had game modes, we had to lower the experience gained from certain skills as they would be too easy to master. I finally remembered why this was occurring and removed the code that divided the xp of certain (a lot of ‘skilling’ skills, including agility and smithing).[/quote]

I have to say Adam well done,

i’m just absolutely LOVING your graphics work with your first thread and your client etc

Read full topic

item.title: RUNIQUE - Iron Man • Grand Exchange • Anti-Scam Gambling • Perfect Combat
item.dc:creator: @adman189 adman189
item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

Bump: [URL=http://“http://runique.org/forum/index.php?/topic/3523-small-updates-041815/”]Recent Updates [04/18/15][/URL]

General Updates:

Highscores have finally been released which can be viewed here [URL=http://“http://runique.org/highscores.php”]Runique Highscores[/URL]

[SPOILER=Highscores][/SPOILER]

Client Updates:

We also have a new login screen made by ZeHD
Along with a new Donator rank added in-game and a modified Veteran rank added - Courtesy of Felix

[SPOILER=Login Screen][/SPOILER]

Skilling Updates

As a lot of you have noticed, specific skills were very innaccurate on their xp compared to RS’ experience and the game mode xp rate. This was because before we had game modes, we had to lower the experience gained from certain skills as they would be too easy to master. I finally remembered why this was occurring and removed the code that divided the xp of certain (a lot of ‘skilling’ skills, including agility and smithing).

Read full topic

Also our black partyhat contest will be closed today at 12am EST, if you haven’t already check out our official facebook page [URL=https://www.facebook.com/pages/Runique-RSPS/790934464275739?fref=nf]Runique-RSPS Official Facebook[/URL], simply like the post and comment your in-game username, 3 winners will be chosen on Friday 5pm EST.

On another note, our player count atm:

Completionist cape customization and achievements have now been released!

Held some trivia today, congratulations to all the winners (they picked their own random reward from my inventory):

Dehjokerboi: who won a bandos chestplate
Andy X D: who won a saradomin godsword
Lethalpill: who won a bandos tasset

I will be holding some more events later today for players in different time zones.

On a site-note: hit 135 players today

item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

Sorry I don’t keep this thread up-to-date on every update (lack of time), but you can read all about our latest updates here:

[URL=http://runique.org/forum/index.php?/topic/3636-recent-updates-260315/]http://runique.org/forum/index.php?/topic/3636-recent-updates-260315/[/URL]
[URL=http://runique.org/forum/index.php?/topic/3671-recent-updates-290315/]http://runique.org/forum/index.php?/topic/3671-recent-updates-290315/[/URL]
[URL=http://runique.org/forum/index.php?/topic/3696-recent-updates-300315/]http://runique.org/forum/index.php?/topic/3696-recent-updates-300315/[/URL]

I have also hosted a few events around 2 hours ago, was a lot of fun. We had PvM, Minigame and Hide n’ Seek events! Congratulations to all the winners:

PvM: Doflaming0, Merchendise and Medley Weapon's Game: Doflaming0 (both rounds) Hide n' Seek: Iron Swain, Joshua, Doflaming0 and Glitch

More events will be held on Friday so stay tuned!

item.title: RUNIQUE - Iron Man • Grand Exchange • Anti-Scam Gambling • Perfect Combat
item.dc:creator: @adman189 adman189
item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

Our store is almost complete, with this store we are finally able to introduce new payment methods a lot of players have been asking for including SMS and paysafecards.

We have setup our store to use ZayPay and BMTMicro

ZayPay:
Zaypay makes international micropayments through SMS, phone calls, in-app and other alternative payment methods a piece of cake

BMTMicro:
BMTMicro allows for multiple methods of payments, below is an image showing which methods are permitted:

The Tokens
The current store token prices I will be showing below, keep in mind this may not be the final prices as we are receiving community feedback [URL=http://“http://community.runique.org/index.php?/topic/3016-new-donation-store-need-communitys-feedback/”]here[/URL] . Note: we will have sales on special occasions, such as what someone suggested a 5-20% sale for the opening of this new shop

Read full topic

@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“relexlawl, post:13, topic:548869”][quote author=naseem142 link=topic=667778.msg4467283#msg4467283 date=1420882691]

Graphics, Animations, Npc and Player characters, basically anything model related. Fetching models from a 474 cache when using old school and fetching models from a 602-667 cache when using new school.

Oh, ok. I just downloaded the new client and the experience , design , quality was amazing (even though needs some twists in spesific locations). But really overall it is amazing so far. I recommend server for others
[/quote]

Thanks that means a lot Are you able to give any suggestions on those ‘twists’? Would love to hear some

holy shit, this truly looks unique good luck

Thank you for the compliment

Hit 150 today:

[/quote]
Congratulations on hitting that new top number.
